mapper.select: SELECT po.*, si.*, oi_prod_qty, oi_tot_price, oi_tracking_company, oi_tracking_num, oi_etc, oi_del_status FROM PRODUCT_ORDER po JOIN order_items oi on po.po_no = oi.oi_po_no JOIN seller_info si ON oi.oi_s_u_id = si.s_u_id WHERE po_u_id = #{po_u_id} ORDER BY po_orderdate DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
